summary: REQ-41, REQ-43, REQ-44 (route/page/link), and REQ-45 appear implemented in the shown diffs. REQ-42 appears implemented via admin bypass routing/guards per RoleLoginPage and App.tsx summaries. The main potentially missing piece is ensuring the actual APK asset exists under frontend public/static assets; the diff only adds a page that links to it.

missing_requirements.requirement: The APK download link points to a stable filename under frontend static public assets (so the link does not change between builds).
missing_requirements.reason: The new APK download page links to a stable path (/assets/primepost.apk), but the diff does not show the APK file being added under frontend public/static assets (or any static asset manifest change). With only the diff summary, we cannot confirm the asset exists and is served.

hallucinated_features.description: Shopping cart logic and UI changes (including route parameter handling for checkout/store navigation).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any of REQ-41..REQ-45; these requirements are about terms/admin bypass, fallback legal text, APK download page, and landing/login copy.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (CartPage summary mentions checkout navigation route parameter fix)

hallucinated_features.description: Added/expanded money, analytics utilities, and cart Zustand persistence changes.
Theme system changes (ThemeProvider/ThemeToggle) and layout updates unrelated to the requested APK/terms/admin behavior (e.g., footer Privacy Policy navigation).
New/updated React Query hook capability for bulk publishing provided legal docs (usePublishProvidedLegalDocs).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-43 only asks for frontend fallback rendering when backend terms content is missing; it does not request new bulk publish mutations/hooks.
